title: VR Utilization and Spaced Learning Strategy Design in Organizational Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Knowledge and Understanding of Organizational Work Processes
context.additional_context: Hybrid environment utilizing VR and 2D video content for security scenario-based training resembling real-world conditions

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate science-based procedural knowledge with over 80% accuracy after training using VR and 2D video.
Learners demonstrate effective information processing by reducing cognitive load by 20% through the application of a spaced learning strategy.
Learners record 4 points or higher (on a 5-point Likert scale) in post-training Technology Acceptance surveys.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
